title: Configuration of QRS complexes in 12-lead electrocardiogram in dogs with monomorphic ventricular tachycardias or complete bundle branch block
details: M Perego, A Maffei, D Cavallini, R Santilli - Frontiers in Veterinary Science
abstract: The differentiation between ventricular tachycardias (VT) and supraventricular tachycardias (SVT) with bundle branch block (BBB) is clinically challenging. The aim of the study was to define by the 12-lead-electrocardiogram the QRS complex …
